{T}: Add {U}.

CELD.name: Oathsworn Knight
CELD.text:

Oathsworn Knight attacks each combat if able.

CELD.text:
+2: Create a Food token.

−5: Exchange control of target artifact or creature you control and target creature an opponent controls with power 3 or less.

CELD.name: Once Upon a Time
CELD.text:
If this spell is the first spell you've cast this game, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

CELD.text:
Flying
When Opportunistic Dragon enters the battlefield, choose target Human or artifact an opponent controls. For as long as Opportunistic Dragon remains on the battlefield, gain control of that permanent, it loses all abilities, and it can't attack or block.

CELD.text:

• 1/2 Human Rogue with haste and "When this creature enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target."

Vigilance, deathtouch, haste

Flying, haste

{2}{W}: Target player gains 5 life.

{4}{B}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under its owner's control.

ELD.flavor: "What good is loyalty to the crown if we are not also in service to those less fortunate? I fight for all of us."
ELD.name: Knight of the Keep

ELD.flavor:
"By hoof, wing, or paw. For the realm!"
—Syr Gwyn, Hero of Ashvale
ELD.name: Knights' Charge
ELD.text:
Whenever a Knight you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{6}{W}{B}, Sacrifice Knights' Charge: Return all Knight creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

ELD.flavor: Transformed at his own wedding, he promptly ate the banquet, the gifts, and the guests.
ELD.name: Korvold, Fae-Cursed King
ELD.text:
Flying
Whenever Korvold, Fae-Cursed King enters the battlefield or attacks, sacrifice another permanent.
Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Korvold and draw a card.

ELD.name: Lochmere Serpent
ELD.text:
Flash
{U}, Sacrifice an Island: Lochmere Serpent can't be blocked this turn.
{B}, Sacrifice a Swamp: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
{U}{B}: Exile five target cards from an opponent's graveyard. Return Lochmere Serpent from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

ELD.flavor: Even death cannot diminish the persistence of the knights of Locthwain.
ELD.name: Lost Legion
ELD.text: When Lost Legion enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

ELD.flavor: His mind chose solitude, but his heart disagreed.
ELD.name: Lovestruck Beast // Heart's Desire
Mace of the Valiant

ELD.flavor: Neither hostile nor friendly, pixies flit through the forest seeking the treasures of the wilds.
ELD.name: Maraleaf Pixie
ELD.text:
Flying
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

ELD.flavor: They both hunger for battle.
ELD.name: Maraleaf Rider
ELD.text: Sacrifice a Food: Target creature blocks Maraleaf Rider this turn if able.

ELD.flavor: "Buying old, worn-out junk. Selling marvels of real value."
ELD.name: Merchant of the Vale // Haggle
Midnight Clock
ELD.text:
{T}: Add {U}.
{2}{U}: Put an hour counter on Midnight Clock.
At the beginning of each upkeep, put an hour counter on Midnight Clock.
When the twelfth hour counter is put on Midnight Clock, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards. Exile Midnight Clock.

ELD.flavor: "Poor, lost mage. Your feet are on land, yet you're in over your head, aren't you?"
ELD.name: Mystical Dispute
ELD.text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a blue spell.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

ELD.name: Oathsworn Knight
ELD.text:
Oathsworn Knight enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
Oathsworn Knight attacks each combat if able.
If damage would be dealt to Oathsworn Knight while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage and remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

ELD.flavor: Knights kept returning from Ogre's Pass wearing nothing but bruises, so they decided to just pretend it was on their side.
ELD.name: Ogre Errant
ELD.text: Whenever Ogre Errant attacks, another target attacking Knight gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

ELD.flavor: They function as everything from assassins to jesters in the name of their fae king.
ELD.name: Oko's Accomplices
ELD.text: Flying

ELD.flavor: "My advisors recommend I let them eat you." —Oko
ELD.name: Oko's Hospitality
ELD.text: Creatures you control have base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Oko, the Trickster, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

ELD.name: Oko, Thief of Crowns
ELD.text:
+2: Create a Food token.
+1: Target artifact or creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Elk creature with base power and toughness 3/3.
−5: Exchange control of target artifact or creature you control and target creature an opponent controls with power 3 or less.

ELD.name: Oko, the Trickster
ELD.text:
+1: Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature you control.
0: Until end of turn, Oko, the Trickster becomes a copy of target creature you control. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.
−7: Until end of turn, each creature you control has base power and toughness 10/10 and gains trample.

ELD.name: Once Upon a Time
ELD.text:
If this spell is the first spell you've cast this game, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

ELD.name: Once and Future
ELD.text:
Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Put up to one other target card from your graveyard on top of your library. Exile Once and Future.
Adamant — If at least three green mana was spent to cast this spell, instead return those cards to your hand and exile Once and Future.

ELD.name: Opportunistic Dragon
ELD.text:
Flying
When Opportunistic Dragon enters the battlefield, choose target Human or artifact an opponent controls. For as long as Opportunistic Dragon remains on the battlefield, gain control of that permanent, it loses all abilities, and it can't attack or block.

ELD.flavor:
"Sometimes the hardest choice is between two wonders."
—Gadwick, the Wizened
ELD.name: Opt
ELD.text:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Draw a card.

ELD.name: Outlaws' Merriment
ELD.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one at random. Create a red and white creature token with those characteristics.
• 3/1 Human Warrior with trample and haste.
• 2/1 Human Cleric with lifelink and haste.
• 1/2 Human Rogue with haste and "When this creature enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target."

ELD.name: Outmuscle
ELD.text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control, then it fights another target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
Adamant — If at least three green mana was spent to cast this spell, the creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.

ELD.name: Piper of the Swarm
ELD.text:
Rats you control have menace.
{1}{B}, {T}: Create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.
{2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice three Rats: Gain control of target creature.

ELD.name: Questing Beast
ELD.text:
Vigilance, deathtouch, haste
Questing Beast can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Combat damage that would be dealt by creatures you control can't be prevented.
Whenever Questing Beast deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals that much damage to target planeswalker that player controls.

ELD.flavor: Many tales of redcap terror begin with two simple things: bloodlust and stolen steel.
ELD.name: Raging Redcap
ELD.text: Double strike

ELD.name: Rankle, Master of Pranks
ELD.text:
Flying, haste
Whenever Rankle, Master of Pranks deals combat damage to a player, choose any number —
• Each player discards a card.
• Each player loses 1 life and draws a card.
• Each player sacrifices a creature.

ELD.flavor:
"Into amethyst, I pour
Envy's shadow, sorrow's gleam.
Lure the one whose scorn I bore
That I may hear one final scream."
—Barrow witch incantation
ELD.name: Reave Soul
ELD.text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.

ELD.flavor:
"Long after the magic wore off, the mice still dreamed of glorious galloping."
—Tales of the Fae
ELD.name: Return to Nature
ELD.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.

ELD.flavor: Syr Damon looked at the dragon and saw the faces of every innocent it had devoured. Suddenly, his sword blazed like the sun.
ELD.name: Righteousness
ELD.text: Target blocking creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

ELD.name: Robber of the Rich
ELD.text:
Reach, haste
Whenever Robber of the Rich attacks, if defending player has more cards in hand than you, exile the top card of their library. During any turn you attacked with a Rogue, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

ELD.flavor: "Old battlefields make great gardens. So rich from the blood of the fallen."
ELD.name: Rosethorn Acolyte // Seasonal Ritual

ELD.flavor:
"It wandered slowly across the landscape, calling out in its lonely voice, but no other castles answered its cries."
—Beyond the Great Henge
ELD.name: Roving Keep
ELD.text:
Defender
{7}: Roving Keep gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. It can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

ELD.flavor: "This sword is Sunrise. The other is Dawn. They mark the beginning of my days but the end of yours."
ELD.name: Rowan's Battleguard
ELD.text:
First strike
As long as you control a Rowan planeswalker, Rowan's Battleguard gets +3/+0.

ELD.name: Rowan's Stalwarts
ELD.text: When Rowan's Stalwarts enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Rowan, Fearless Sparkmage, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

ELD.name: Rowan, Fearless Sparkmage
ELD.text:
+1: Up to one target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
−2: Rowan, Fearless Sparkmage deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.
−9: Gain control of all creatures until end of turn. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn.

ELD.flavor:
"Virtue is virtue, whatever the heart that nurtures it."
—Malacan, Vantress exile
ELD.name: Run Away Together
ELD.text: Choose two target creatures controlled by different players. Return those creatures to their owners' hands.

ELD.flavor: None of the other villagers dare venture into the wilds, so she feeds the whole hamlet herself.
ELD.name: Savvy Hunter
ELD.text:
Whenever Savvy Hunter attacks or blocks, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
Sacrifice two Foods: Draw a card.

ELD.flavor: As the blaze raced towards her, Syr Ameril closed her eyes and pictured Castle Ardenvale so her last thoughts would be of home.
ELD.name: Scorching Dragonfire
ELD.text: Scorching Dragonfire deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.

ELD.flavor: It emerged from the coldest depths of Lochmere only to face the fires of Irencrag.
ELD.name: Searing Barrage
ELD.text:
Searing Barrage deals 5 damage to target creature.
Adamant — If at least three red mana was spent to cast this spell, Searing Barrage deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

ELD.flavor:
"The gleam of rubies and my brothers and sisters by my side . . . what more could I want?"
—Brognold the Third
ELD.name: Seven Dwarves
ELD.text:
Seven Dwarves gets +1/+1 for each other creature named Seven Dwarves you control.
A deck can have up to seven cards named Seven Dwarves.

ELD.name: Shambling Suit
ELD.text: Shambling Suit's power is equal to the number of artifacts and/or enchantments you control.

ELD.flavor: The indigo dragon gladly traded a bit of its hoard for everlasting moonlight.
ELD.name: Shimmer Dragon
ELD.text:
Flying
As long as you control four or more artifacts, Shimmer Dragon has hexproof.
Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Draw a card.

ELD.name: Shinechaser
ELD.text:
Flying, vigilance
Shinechaser gets +1/+1 as long as you control an artifact.
Shinechaser gets +1/+1 as long as you control an enchantment.

ELD.name: Shining Armor
ELD.text:
Flash
When Shining Armor enters the battlefield, attach it to target Knight you control.
Equipped creature gets +0/+2 and has vigilance.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

ELD.flavor: Tempered by fire and united in virtue, the knights of Ardenvale fight with a single, unbreakable will.
ELD.name: Silverflame Ritual
ELD.text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
Adamant — If at least three white mana was spent to cast this spell, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

ELD.name: Silverwing Squadron
ELD.text:
Flying, vigilance
Silverwing Squadron's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
Whenever Silverwing Squadron attacks, create a number of 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance equal to the number of opponents you have.

ELD.flavor: The ogre crashed through the massive door. The winged folios scattered like frightened birds.
ELD.name: Skullknocker Ogre
ELD.text: Whenever Skullknocker Ogre deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random. If the player does, they draw a card.

ELD.flavor: The purest virtue burns brighter than the sun and hotter than dragonfire.
ELD.name: Slaying Fire
ELD.text:
Slaying Fire deals 3 damage to any target.
Adamant — If at least three red mana was spent to cast this spell, it deals 4 damage instead.

ELD.flavor: "My quest? Why, to marry Ayara. Or die trying."
ELD.name: Smitten Swordmaster // Curry Favor
Sorcerous Spyglass
ELD.text:
As Sorcerous Spyglass enters the battlefield, look at an opponent's hand, then choose any card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

ELD.flavor:
"Though long forgotten, the wheel continued to turn, spinning fate from a dusty attic."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*
ELD.name: Spinning Wheel
ELD.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{5}, {T}: Tap target creature.

ELD.flavor: Many an ancient treasure has been reduced to jagged caltrops by its snapping jaws.
ELD.name: Steelbane Hydra
ELD.text:
Steelbane Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Steelbane Hydra: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

ELD.flavor:
"A traditional lance is fine for the Burning Yard, but in the wilds you need a nastier bite."
—Kenver, Embereth weaponsmith
ELD.name: Steelclaw Lance
ELD.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
Equip Knight {1} ({1}: Attach to target Knight creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

ELD.flavor: Denizens of the wilds don't always seek to harm intruders. Sometimes they simply misplace them.
ELD.name: Stolen by the Fae
ELD.text: Return target creature with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand. You create X 1/1 blue Faerie creature tokens with flying.

ELD.flavor: "Duty and honor are reasons enough, but beating you will also be a pleasure."
ELD.name: Syr Carah, the Bold
ELD.text:
When Syr Carah, the Bold or an instant or sorcery spell you control deals damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.
{T}: Syr Carah deals 1 damage to any target.

ELD.name: Syr Elenora, the Discerning
ELD.text:
Syr Elenora, the Discerning's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
When Syr Elenora enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Spells your opponents cast that target Syr Elenora cost {2} more to cast.

ELD.flavor: Squires throughout the realm aspire to her mix of panache and martial prowess.
ELD.name: Syr Gwyn, Hero of Ashvale
ELD.text:
Vigilance, menace
Whenever an equipped creature you control attacks, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Equipment you control have equip Knight {0}.

ELD.name: Syr Konrad, the Grim
ELD.text:
Whenever another creature dies, or a creature card is put into a graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield, or a creature card leaves your graveyard, Syr Konrad, the Grim deals 1 damage to each opponent.
{1}{B}: Each player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

ELD.flavor:
"Hone the knife and mourn the least. Three chimes to sound the sweet, grim feast."
—Barrow witch incantation
ELD.name: Taste of Death
ELD.text: Each player sacrifices three creatures. You create three Food tokens.

ELD.name: The Circle of Loyalty
ELD.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Knight you control.
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a legendary spell, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
{3}{W}, {T}: Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

ELD.name: The Royal Scions
ELD.text:
+1: Draw a card, then discard a card.
+1: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike and trample until end of turn.
−8: Draw four cards. When you do, The Royal Scions deals damage to any target equal to the number of cards in your hand.

ELD.flavor: It will come to the defense of all wild things, from the shivering wren to the towering giant.
ELD.name: Thorn Mammoth
ELD.text:
Trample
Whenever Thorn Mammoth or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Thorn Mammoth fights up to one target creature you don't control.

ELD.name: Thornwood Falls
ELD.text:
Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped.
When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

ELD.flavor: While humans hear only a deafening roar, the fae hear music of breathtaking beauty.
ELD.name: Thunderous Snapper
ELD.text: Whenever you cast a spell with converted mana cost 5 or greater, draw a card.

ELD.flavor: "Humans are so forgetful. Every page I steal becomes a secret they can't remember."
ELD.name: Tome Raider
ELD.text:
Flying
When Tome Raider enters the battlefield, draw a card.

ELD.name: Tome of Legends
ELD.text:
Tome of Legends enters the battlefield with a page counter on it.
Whenever your commander enters the battlefield or attacks, put a page counter on Tome of Legends.
{1}, {T}, Remove a page counter from Tome of Legends: Draw a card.

ELD.flavor: No one knows when the tournament began. All they know is that it will never end.
ELD.name: Tournament Grounds
ELD.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}. Spend this mana only to cast a Knight or Equipment spell.

ELD.name: Trail of Crumbs
ELD.text:
When Trail of Crumbs enters the battlefield, create a Food token.
Whenever you sacrifice a Food, you may pay {1}. If you do, look at the top two cards of your library. You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

ELD.flavor: "At least up here I have some peace and quiet."
ELD.name: Trapped in the Tower
ELD.text:
Enchant creature without flying
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

ELD.flavor:
"Be careful, some people deserve their curses."
—Marawen, barrow witch
ELD.name: True Love's Kiss
ELD.text:
Exile target artifact or enchantment.
Draw a card

ELD.name: Turn into a Pumpkin
ELD.text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Draw a card.
Adamant — If at least three blue mana was spent to cast this spell, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

ELD.flavor: "May this blade guide you on your great journey, as it did me on mine."
ELD.name: Venerable Knight
ELD.text: When Venerable Knight dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target Knight you control.

ELD.flavor:
"A good steed will carry you home. A great steed will carry you to glory."
— Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw
ELD.name: Wandermare
ELD.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell that has an Adventure, put a +1/+1 counter on Wandermare. (It doesn't need to have gone on the adventure first.)

ELD.flavor:
"I would rather cast myself into the abyss than let my blood stain the cap of those monsters."
—Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw
ELD.name: Weaselback Redcap
ELD.text: {1}{R}: Weaselback Redcap gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

ELD.flavor: "Some are born to greatness. You were born to scrub greatness's floors."
ELD.name: Wicked Guardian
ELD.text: When Wicked Guardian enters the battlefield, you may have it deal 2 damage to another creature you control. If you do, draw a card.

ELD.name: Wicked Wolf
ELD.text:
When Wicked Wolf enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature you don't control.
Sacrifice a Food: Put a +1/+1 counter on Wicked Wolf. It gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

ELD.name: Wildborn Preserver
ELD.text:
Flash
Reach
Whenever another non-Human creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {X}. When you do, put X +1/+1 counters on Wildborn Preserver.

ELD.flavor: "This one was wearing shoes made of glass. She'll be no ordinary prey."
ELD.name: Wildwood Tracker
ELD.text: Whenever Wildwood Tracker attacks or blocks, if you control another non-Human creature, Wildwood Tracker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

ELD.name: Wind-Scarred Crag
ELD.text:
Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped.
When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

ELD.name: Wintermoor Commander
ELD.text:
Deathtouch
Wintermoor Commander's toughness is equal to the number of Knights you control.
Whenever Wintermoor Commander attacks, another target Knight you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

ELD.name: Wishclaw Talisman
ELD.text:
Wishclaw Talisman enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it.
{1}, {T}, Remove a wish counter from Wishclaw Talisman: Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. An opponent gains control of Wishclaw Talisman. Activate this ability only during your turn.

ELD.flavor: She yearned to walk on dry land so she might take her vengeance there.
ELD.name: Wishful Merfolk
ELD.text:
Defender
{1}{U}: Wishful Merfolk loses defender and becomes a Human until end of turn.

ELD.name: Witch's Cottage
ELD.text:
({T}: Add {B}.)
Witch's Cottage enters the battlefield tapped unless you control three or more other Swamps.
When Witch's Cottage enters the battlefield untapped, you may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

ELD.flavor: The wafting smells are both scrumptious and suspicious.
ELD.name: Witch's Oven
ELD.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Create a Food token. If the sacrificed creature's toughness was 4 or greater, create two Food tokens instead. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

ELD.flavor: The hex swept through the village, its citizens falling one by one.
ELD.name: Witch's Vengeance
ELD.text: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get -3/-3 until end of turn.

ELD.flavor: It was built by the witch of Lochmere. Most of the wishes it grants are its own.
ELD.name: Witching Well
ELD.text:
When Witching Well enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
{3}{U}, Sacrifice Witching Well: Draw two cards.

ELD.flavor:
"Fear not what's under the bed. The toys are watching."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*
ELD.name: Workshop Elders
ELD.text:
Artifact creatures you control have flying.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target noncreature artifact you control become a 0/0 artifact creature. If you do, put four +1/+1 counters on it.

ELD.flavor: Every Ardenvale aspirant must step through the flame. Their honor determines whether they burn or shine.
ELD.name: Worthy Knight
ELD.text: Whenever you cast a Knight spell, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
